test.description: Checks API calling code. Any arguments passed into this method are returned.

postMessage.description: Sends a message to a channel.

channel.description: Channel to send message to. Can be a public channel, private group or IM channel. Can be an encoded ID, or a name.

text.description: Text of the message to send. See below for an explanation of formatting.

link_names.description: Find and link channel names and usernames.

unfurl_links.description: Pass true to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content.

unfurl_media.description: Pass false to disable unfurling of media content.

icon_url.description: URL to an image to use as the icon for this message

icon_emoji.description: emoji to use as the icon for this message. Overrides icon_url.

user.description: Filter files created by a single user.

ts_from.description: Filter files created after this timestamp (inclusive).

ts_to.description: Filter files created before this timestamp (inclusive).

types.description:
Filter files by type:

all - All files
posts - Posts
snippets - Snippets
images - Image files
gdocs - Google docs
zips - Zip files
pdfs - PDF files

You can pass multiple values in the types argument, like types=posts,snippets.The default value is all, which does not filter the list.

count.description: Number of items to return per page.

page.description: Page number of results to return.

createChild.description:
This method takes an existing private group and performs the following steps:

Renames the existing group (from `example` to `example-archived`).
Archives the existing group.
Creates a new group with the name of the existing group.
Adds all members of the existing group to the new group.
This is useful when inviting a new member to an existing group while hiding all previous chat history from them. In this scenario you can call groups.createChild followed by groups.invite.

The new group will have a special parent_group property pointing to the original archived group. This will only be returned for members of both groups, so will not be visible to any newly invited members.

errors.channel_not_found': Value passed for channel was invalid.

errors.restricted_action': A team preference prevents the authenticated user from creating groups.
